website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a value option, we recommend the Philips model.
pros: Offers sterilizing capabilities and capacity that compare to Dr. Brown's model, but at a lower price
cons: Drying function doesn't get bottles completely dry

customer_reviews.title: Way better than boiling on the stove. Large
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 9 months and I love it. It’s a time saver vs boiling in a pot since I can set it and forget it. It’s large enough to fit 3 sets of my Medela freestyle pump parts and a few nipples. I do have to remember to remove everything onto a drying rack though or all of the condensation will remain on the parts/nipples as long as they sit in there. So I do wish there was some sort of drying option for the nights that I have forgotten to remove everything
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions for use, and it leaves a TON of water all over the bottles. It doesn't get hot enough nor stay hot enough for long enough to effectively make steam, so it just condenses instead. End up having to wipe down the bottles to use them, effectively nullifying sanitizing them. Has become a useless product.
customer_reviews.author: dekeyser11

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Must buy. Wonderful! Easy to use. happy with the amount of bottles & pacifiers I can sterilize at once. Gets brown sometimes maybe because I did not put enough water in it before sterilizing but it's a easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We went on a weekend road trip with our 11 wk old baby. Bought this for the tommee tippee bottles we use. Worked great to also sanitize the breast pump accessories and pumping bottles. Very convenient in the hotel. Holds 6 bottles and nipples or a couple bottles and breast pump items. Have also been using it at home. Much more economical than running a half full dishwasher every day simply because you needed clean and sanitized bottles.
customer_reviews.author: AB Batch

customer_reviews.title: Love Tommee Tippee products and would absolutely recommend and buy ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this daily and have every day for the last 8 months. It works as well today as the day we unpacked it. Love Tommee Tippee products and would absolutely recommend and buy again. Edit 2.23.16: We have been using this for almost a year now and its still working as well as it did the day we unboxed it. Great product - would buy again, no question about it!!
customer_reviews.author: Haley E.

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry bottles
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice sterilizer my biggest pet peeve with it is that it does not dry the bottles! For the price I think it's fair to expect that . The bottles stay wet like super wet .
customer_reviews.author: nishamc

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Used it to sterilize my pump parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Used it to sterilize my pump parts each night. It runs quickly and the instructions say that the items stay sterilized for almost a day if left untouched. I'd run this at night, between my pumpings that had the largest gap, and then would store the pump parts in the fridge the rest of the day. Made my life SO much easier, especially during the middle of the night. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KetchupSpudTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I use this sterilizer for both tommee tippee bottles & Dr. Brown wide neck bottles. It's easy to clean & keeps my baby's bottles clean & free from germs. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This steamer saved my life. I grossly underestimated the cleaning needs of my pump parts, let alone bottles. I also had no clue about sterilizing/ The first time I washed and sterilized everything it took me hours and the giant pot of boiling water made my kitchen in to a sauna. I freaked out. Then I bought this little pup and 6 months later I can honestly say that I probably would have lost my ever-loving mind if I hadn't. A dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: Mollieeee

customer_reviews.title: We cleaned the heat plate on a regular basis as directed and it held up just fine! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used everyday for almost a year and never had a problem. We cleaned the heat plate on a regular basis as directed and it held up just fine! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HSell14

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Works well for a variety of baby bottle and pump parts.
customer_reviews.text: Works for all different size bottles, pump parts, etc. Quick and easy to use. Only problem is the residual water that drains back down to the bottom so you need to wipe it out if you don't want it reusing the same water. Maybe I didn't read the instructions correctly because I thought you should add more water each time. Either way it's working for us right now and compared to other models, the shape is great and fits a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great for breast pumps
customer_reviews.text: Works great for tommee tippee bottles and breast pump parts. Only takes a few minutes to sanitize. It is hard to arrange the taller narrow mouth bottles (Dr Brown). You can only fit a few non tommee tippee bottles at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I like how this sanitizes in five minutes
customer_reviews.text: I like how this sanitizes in five minutes. It makes things ready when I need them. What I don't like is how much condensation it leaves. I have to carefully take the lid off otherwise I will spill quite a bit of water everywhere that has collected on the inside of the lid. Also bottles and nipples have to be turned upside down after sanitizing to help the water dry out.
customer_reviews.author: CSJR2011

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Cleans up well and holds short 5 once bottles and long 8/12 ounce bottles as well from other brands. The top tray holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nelia

customer_reviews.title: Spacious sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very spacious sanitizer. I could sanitize few couple dr brown's large bottles along with all my pump parts in the same time. Such a time saver. I have gifted that to my friends on the baby shower. It is little expensive compared to other other brands but totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: SJV

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep the baby healthy! 😄
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family members new baby. She's pretty happy with it. Works fairly fast and keeps everything clean. Just make sure you use distilled water or it will crud up the heater coils.
customer_reviews.author: Carbonhead

customer_reviews.title: The best and biggest sterilizer out there!
customer_reviews.text: Best sterilizer out there. I found this at Ross for $36 and got it as gifts for my pregnant sisters. I paid almost $60 on amazon for mine, but it is worth every penny. I love that you can fit toys and other items in there easily. It works fast. I use it at least 10 times a day for the past 9 months!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: It's great for TT and 5 oz bottles
customer_reviews.text: It's great for TT and 5 oz bottles. I wouldn't use it for 8 oz bottles. Also the descaling method is stressful. One more thing - it takes forever for the bottles to completely dry when I take them out of the sterilizer and put on bottle rack.
customer_reviews.author: Onitemi

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It's so nice to be able to wash ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's so nice to be able to wash and sterilize bottles, pump parts, and pacifiers so quickly. I use it more than I thought I would. I was able to wait for the price to go down which helped a lot. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this sterilizer. It works great... but you definitely have to scale it every few days, because the water will turn brown on the bottom of the machine. We use vinegar and some water, and run a cycle. You can put the plastic inserts through the dishwasher. Works with other brands of bottles as well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A Johns

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind knowing bottles are sterile
customer_reviews.text: We are past the bottle stage now but used this product daily while our son took bottles. It does a great job and held up perfectly for the year we used it. It's in storage now and we'll get it back out for the next one, and I see no reason it won't last through multiple kids.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like it, and couldn't beat the price I paid! I do however wish they were more dry when sterilizer is done. They are still pretty soaked when it's done. I did expect this and bought it despite that. I'm not sure there is one available that dry's them as well anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It fits different sizes of bottles, it is fast and very handy
customer_reviews.text: Great great great.... I super used it... It fits also my big bottles. It is very fast and after 3/4 minutes you can get the bottles out. The only thing I didnt like is that the bottom is getting difficult to clean from residues of the water after it evaporates. I am sure you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Best and most spacious sanitizer!
customer_reviews.text: We love this steamer! I'm against microwaves for many reasons so this was the best solution to sanitizing all pump parts and bottles! We run this machine twice a day and it works great! It holds so many items and gets everything squeaky clean! Super fast and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: 1smartmommy

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for us. We go through bottles like crazy, and our son was having issues with thrush in his mouth. Once we got this sterilizer, we noticed that his thrush began disappearing, and now it is completely gone and has not returned! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Matych

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and quick clean
customer_reviews.text: Makes life for s busy mom so much easier to clean bottles and pump parts. Super easy to use and quick clean. Don't regret this purchase at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Francis

customer_reviews.title: ... daily for about 4 weeks now and it's working great! Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this sterilizer daily for about 4 weeks now and it's working great! Easy to use, holds a lot of stuff, and sterilizes quickly (in about 5 min). 4 stars because I don't like that you have to empty risidual water from device after use. Would be nice if there was a drain spout or something to make it easier. Also cord is not long enough. I use this item in a bedroom, not on the kitchen counter, so I have to use an extension cord to make it run to the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelife

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This works good. It does get slimy in the bottom so you have to wash often, but I think that's true for any of them...
customer_reviews.author: Anna T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Does the job fast and well
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does the job fast and well. Only cons are the flimsy top. Hard to balance while putting nipples and things on top. Other con is the amount of moisture left on the bottles and unit. I just hand dry them for this reason. Other than that it's an excellent machine and I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Garza

customer_reviews.title: One button operation and it doesn't leak. My only ...
customer_reviews.text: One button operation and it doesn't leak. My only qualm is that you must empty the remaining water each time you sterilize and refill with the correct amount of water. If the water amount is not correct, proper sterilization won't occur.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this sterilizer. Very easy to use and fits a lot of parts.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. We had a microwave sterilizer when our first daughter was born. This electric one is much easier to use, and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmid

customer_reviews.title: My friend she just had a baby girl and highly recommended me to have this one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer when it went on sale. My friend she just had a baby girl and highly recommended me to have this one. My baby boy just born last week and my husband and I use it almost everyday. Love it when the first time to try it. It can hold up to six bottles at one time and save lots of our effort and time to sanitize the baby feeding stuff. Highly recommend it to the parents who cares the health of their babies.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Xu

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this as future gift to myself. Doesn't hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as future gift to myself. Doesn't hurt to prepare yourself for the future. Purchased one previously for my sister and she has no problems with hers.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these. One in our house and anther in our vacation house. Super easy to use. We mix and match various brand of bottles... works on everything! :)
customer_reviews.author: K-Cal

customer_reviews.title: It works for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: follow instruction and it works great for what it's made for. Not for lazy people who don't want to clean a sterilizer, yes you need to empty the water once awhile and clean, that's what keep it sterilized.
customer_reviews.author: Wesau

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the bottles but loved the sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the bottles but loved the sterilizer. I use it to sterilize Dr browns bottles. It's quick and easy to use however it is very important that you clean it frequently!
customer_reviews.author: ranjandada

customer_reviews.title: Good product, must keed dry after use
customer_reviews.text: Good product and sterilazes fast, you have to dri it after every use or the bottom plate after time becomes rusted
customer_reviews.author: Alex u

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best steam sterilizer out there...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for new mother's, to have peace of mind, that they are sterilizing the items the babies come into contact with, making sure they stay away from all the harmful germs, you have to take every step, to keep them as happy, healthy as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Doesn't really work with other brand bottles but ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Doesn't really work with other brand bottles but if you only use tommee tippee like I do that's not a big deal. I gave 4 stars cause I wish it had a spot for the tommee tippee breast pump pieces and for pacifiers.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The best thing is sterilization time
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product. The best thing is sterilization time. It just takes 5-6 min and job is done.
customer_reviews.author: S-R

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my different bottles & extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my different bottles & extremely easy to use... Especially if you have Tommee Tippee bottles as they have a special mark to show how much water is needed to run the sterilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Just clean as instructed!
customer_reviews.text: We descale as described and have had no issues after almost 6 months of daily / multiple times daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Sims

customer_reviews.title: nope, i won't recommend it. bought it and return it when realized that it wasn't doing its work.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product at all. doesn't sterilized as claims to. wont even get hot enough to cause condensation inside the machine. thou i'd like to give it one start for taking it back and refunding me the total cost of product. this was a purchase not a gift.
customer_reviews.author: P-Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Holds a lot of items
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Holds a lot of items. Only takes 8 min to sterilize. Make sure to descaled it often, other than that its maintenance free. I recommend it when having to do several items at a time.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Fast and worry free. I use with Tommee Tippee bottles and Medela pump parts and it does a great job. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessRofAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Simply a bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless. You end up with bottles that are soaking wet, and needs to be washed with water/dried with cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Krasnov

customer_reviews.title: Love this sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this sterilizer! I've been using this twice a day for about 2 months now, and it works great. Very spacious, has two levels which is great for putting smaller items on the top. Easy to use, easy to clean, auto shut-off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chung

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Does the job effortlessly. Easy to clean, experienced no buildup or problems. It is a must have for busy moms
customer_reviews.author: Kareem

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Just one thing
customer_reviews.text: A real lifesaver. Works great. Just one thing, it would be great to have information on how to decalcify. What product is good and non toxic...
customer_reviews.author: S. Bode

customer_reviews.title: Poor product, I would not buy this brand again
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for less than 6 months and it stop working. I'm really frustrated with this product. Poor product, I would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: I love all the tommee tippee products
customer_reviews.text: I love all the tommee tippee products. This maybe one of my favorite. It came on time as well. The con: is that I wish the cord was a little bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: The Tommee Tippee ELectric Steam Sterilizer works great. It holds my larger bottles as well as smaller bottles. It has two racks allowing for more things to steam at once. It's also fast and doesn't take up too much counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Wooters

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a workhorse. We use it multiple times a day, everyday, and have for more than 1 year. Negatives: 1. The piece that connects the top shelf to the bottom shelf "snaps" into place...but often slides down until it touches the heating pad. 2. The lid can be tricky to line up. 3. The bottom heating pad has started to great a little mildew if it isn't cleaned/dried after each use
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bought it again for our 2nd
customer_reviews.text: Had this steriizer 4 years ago when we had our 1st child. Great product, bought it again for our 2nd
customer_reviews.author: *J*H*

customer_reviews.title: Time-saver. Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Plastic seems of better quality. Quick sterilizing cycle - approx 6-7 minutes + 3 minutes (or more) of cooling period.
customer_reviews.author: Knight

customer_reviews.title: There are two things I don't like about this product
customer_reviews.text: There are two things I don't like about this product: there is no off button, and the center stem is poorly designed, so it keeps falling down. As can be seen in the attached photo, the center stem is held in place my a plastic tab. Even if the tab is placed perfectly flush with the plastic below it, the heat from the steam can cause it to change position, and it doesn't take much weight at all to make the plastic tab slip off, which causes the stem fall through the hole. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Curley Joe

customer_reviews.title: Big sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: It's good and I used it for may be for 6 months and it broke down. Ordered other only for the big size it has
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Dcw in CA
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter after the birth of her twins. What a life saver. I would definitely recommend this product to all new mothers.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Watson

customer_reviews.title: New mom
customer_reviews.text: This made life so much easier. I can't imagine having to actually boil bottles after using this sterilizer. It's quick and easy to use. I haven't found anything that I can't fit in here. I've even used it for small plastic toys. The run time is pretty short but I haven't actually timed it. It really takes the headache out of bottle sterilizing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for All Disinfecting!
customer_reviews.text: Best Product in lieu of boiling and wasting tons of water. Perfect for my breast pump attachments as well. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Great working, large capacity steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love this sterilizer. It is so much easier, faster, and more convenient than boiling. I also feel that boiling wore down the plastic on my other bottles and the steam seems to be much gentler. It has a large capacity so it can fit many items, from bottles and nipples to pumping parts and pacifiers and small gumming items. The lid doubles as a sterile work surface or "catch-all" since it sterilizes with each cycle. The cycle itself runs fairly quickly also so you're not waiting around too long. The only "minus" I can see is that it leaves droplets inside the bottles and nipples which do not evaporate easily and you have to dry with a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: VFlower2011

customer_reviews.title: It's large and works fast. 10-11 min. The ...
customer_reviews.text: It's large and works fast. 10-11 min. The center of the bottom rack discolored a little after two weeks use due to heat from the metal underneath. Not sure if it's bpa free.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabella

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. It's worth buying for parents with babies
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. It's worth buying for parents with babies. Not only madela bottle fit I put everything. Don't put toys because it will melt. .
customer_reviews.author: JORDENIA

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream and the descaling is easy
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream and the descaling is easy. We had the cusinart sterilizer before and this one can handle a much larger capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: . I rated it a 5 star because the idea came on time or sooner as well as the seller kept the info updated constantly I always knew were it. The product is easy to put together. I just love it
customer_reviews.author: Daisy c.

customer_reviews.title: Product works well for steaming bottle. Only complaint is ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works well for steaming bottle. Only complaint is that it's kind of big. I guess that's the trade off to do 6 bottles at once. First one we got was defective but supplier exchanged it with no issuses.
customer_reviews.author: raylisamartin@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: but after short time i wash all with soap still
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: No issues after two months of use. Press the button and it sterilized everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: easy, and effective steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We use this every day. Quick, easy, and effective steam cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It contains a lot and it's super quick to use! I absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Massignan

customer_reviews.title: Works great for sterilization
customer_reviews.text: If you are concerned about bacteria or something something getting on your infant's bottles this works great to sterilize and is easy to setup. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: TheWolf

customer_reviews.title: Sterilizes very fast and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Sterilizes very fast and very easy to clean. This is also big and can fit bottles including my breast pump accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use, very useful, and also it does sterilizes everything you put in it in only 5 minutes. I use it for my tommee tippee bottles but i'm pretty sure that it suites for any bottle. Also, i sterilize in it pacifiers, pumping instruments and anything I use for feeding my baby. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria Castro

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and does it well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to replace a advent brand model which seem to leave an odor. The Tommee Tippee doesn't have this problem and I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: itismeap

customer_reviews.title: This product has saved me so much time with steralizing ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved me so much time with steralizing the bottles and equipment and made my life a breeze with breast feeding!
customer_reviews.author: Cyrenne

customer_reviews.title: fill the baby bottle to the 5oz water line mark ...
customer_reviews.text: fill the baby bottle to the 5oz water line mark, pour it inside the sterilizer, add your caps, nipples, bottles, pacifiers, etc to capacity that sterilizer fits, secure the lid, plug it in, turn on button, wait 7 mins and its all done and your ready for the next load. its impossible to mess this up and sterilizes very well and efficiently. if there is any water remaining, just dump into sink and start with new fresh 50x of water for next load. I have done 9 loads already and don't have any issues at all
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: Almost there but not yet
customer_reviews.text: Fast but I wished there was a way to have the bottles dried up.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for all things baby. We also use it to sterilize our glass jars for canning! Multiple uses!
customer_reviews.author: Scott22

customer_reviews.title: I don't like that the machine itself gets gross and needs to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan. I don't like that the machine itself gets gross and needs to be constantly cleaned. I'm guessing that's how many sanitizers are. However, to me it defeats the purpose. I don't want to put bottles in a dirty machine to get them sanitized. I do follow the directions to keep the machine clean, but it still gets gross. It even has a smell to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: use it daily since baby was born, now shes 6 month old we still use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: AngelMommy

customer_reviews.title: I just dont like the plastic smell it releases from the plastic being ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well to well, I just dont like the plastic smell it releases from the plastic being heated.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn C

customer_reviews.title: Clean and sterile
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and easy to use. My only complaint is that I wish it held more items.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, saves a ton of time boiling bottles and pump parts! a bit large, but worth the counter real estate!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This electric steamer is bulky and uncomfortable to use if ...
customer_reviews.text: This electric steamer is bulky and uncomfortable to use if you are using any other bottles than tomee tippee
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: All around great product, plenty of room.
customer_reviews.text: All around great product, plenty of room. Very useful for a first time mother who is afraid of the dishwasher not being safe enough ;)
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pyle

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and great at its job
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and so good at its job. Keeps my baby healthy and that's all you can ask :)
customer_reviews.author: Kay Giselle Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift. I had used a tommee ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. I had used a tommee Tippee mug as a kid in the 70s, so had to get this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Chapelhillkid

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and fast
customer_reviews.text: super easy setup easy to use use a little water and gets the job done in 5 minutes works like a charm 30 year old father of a 5 year old and a new born nov 2014
customer_reviews.author: Sean J. Valadez

customer_reviews.title: Good price! Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Good price! Works like it should, pretty simple setup and comes with 2 bottles. Wish it told me what size nipple the bottles that are included come with. Sterilizer is quick!
customer_reviews.author: PMO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the space but you will still need a drying rack.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly P.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes bottles, pacifiers, breast pump shields, and toys are sterilized. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: delilah

customer_reviews.title: good so far
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. It is easy to use and clean. Tall 9 ounce bottles would not fit but I simply removed the top rack from it. So that works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Tommee Tippee Electric Steam Sterilizer
product_meta.description:
The heat plate can be affected by limescale. We recommend that the steriliser is descaled often, if the unit is not descaled then it can have an effect on the cycle times. To remedy we would recommend the consumer follows the descaling instructions. Note: Descaling steriliser- Always unplug the appliance and wait until it has cooled down completely before descaling. 1. Empty the steriliser and wipe inside with a sponge or damp cloth 2. Pour in 1 cup (250ml) of white vinegar and leave for between 30 mins and 24 hours, depending on the extent of limescale 3. Pour any remaining liquid down the sink and rinse with cool water. Use a sponge or cloth to remove any loose bits of limescale 4. Plug your steriliser back in, adding the regular volume of water for a normal cycle. 5. Turn on and run for 5-minutes then give a final rinse.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
1-877-248-6922
feature_bullets: Compact and easy to use- just push one button
Sterilizes a day’s worth of bottles (6) bottles in 5 minutes
Chemical free sterilizing kills 99.9% of germs
